detail_desc: Straight-cut top in sturdy cotton jersey with a boat neck, 3/4-length sleeves and rounded hem.
Balconette lace bra with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that lift and shape. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Platform ankle boots in imitation leather with a zip in one side. Fabric linings and insoles. Platform front 2.5 cm, heel approx. 10.5.

Padded parka with a detachable, lined, faux fur-trimmed hood, and a zip with a chin guard and wind flap with press-studs down the front. Handwarmer pockets, flap front pockets and a small zipped pocket on one sleeve. Inner ribbing at the cuffs. Quilted lining.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover, drawstring hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Heart-shaped sunglasses with glittery plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.

Trousers in woven fabric in a relaxed fit with two pairs of hook-and-eye fasteners and a zip fly. Side pockets, fake welt pockets at the back and tapered legs with turn-ups and covered buttons at the hems.
Leather belt with a metal buckle. Width 2.5 cm.

Running tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a brushed thermal inside, elastication and a concealed drawstring waist, a zipped key pocket at the back and a zip at the hems. Reflective details.
Soft leather sliders with leather linings and insoles.
Fitted jersey top with narrow shoulder straps.
Short-sleeved blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck, textured metal buttons at the top and a seam under the bust.
Long-sleeved top in soft slub cotton jersey with a round neck, wide flounce over the shoulders and a rounded hem with a small embroidered appliqué at the front.

Calf-length dress in a textured weave made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend. Square neckline front and back, short puff sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, a concealed zip in one side and gathered seams at the waist and hem. Lined.
Scarves in patterned satin that can also be tied as a hairband. Size 30x80 cm.
Blouse in a semi-transparent textured weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck and long sleeves with flounced, asymmetric cuffs.
Jacket in washed cotton twill with embroidery, a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets, welt side pockets and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Sleeveless jersey dress in a modal and cotton blend with a wide neckline and seam at the waist with a drawstring. Practical inner top for easier nursing access.
Padded ski mittens in wind- and water-repellent functional fabric with elastication and a hook and loop fastener at the top. Reflective details and Thinsulate™ lining. Size 3-6 M without thumbs.
Biker jacket in soft imitation leather with quilted sections over the shoulders, notch lapels with decorative press-studs, and a diagonal zip down the front. Lined.
Off-the-shoulder dress in a soft viscose weave with elastication and a flounce with broderie anglaise at the top. Elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
Metal earrings in various sizes and designs. Five pairs with pearly pendants. Size from 1.5 cm to 4 cm.

Suit trousers in a jacquard weave with a concealed button, hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button and legs with creases. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette. For the matching jacket, search on 0575471.

Baby Exclusive. Short-sleeved romper suit in soft terry made from an organic cotton blend with a narrow, elasticated seam at the waist. Press-studs at the back of the neck, concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs in sizes 0-2Y, and elasticated hems.
Short, V-neck dress in woven fabric with a detachable tie belt at the waist and long sleeves with a slit and button at the cuffs. Unlined.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with short sleeves and short legs. Ribbing around the neckline, sleeves and hems, and press-stud fastenings.
Long-sleeved cardigan in a soft, loose knit with no buttons. The polyester content of the cardigan is recycled.
Socks in a jacquard-knit cotton blend supplied in a transparent plastic Christmas tree bauble.
Wide, fabric-covered Alice band with a knot detail on the top.

Knee-length dress in jersey crêpe. V-neck with a sewn-in wrapover at the top and gathered seams at the shoulders and waist for a gentle draped effect. Gathered yoke at the back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a seam with narrow elastication at the waist.
Jersey scrunchie
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a chest pocket, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
All-in-one suit in soft fleece. Hood with appliqués and embroidery, a zip down the front with a chin guard, and jersey ribbing at the cuffs and hems. Unlined.
V-neck T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Fitted cardigan in ribbed jersey made from a cotton blend with a V-neck and eyelet buttoning down the front. Overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in stretch jersey with a wide neckline and gathers at the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Cardigan in a soft, fine knit with slits in the sides and no buttons.
Long-sleeved V-neck top in softly draping viscose jersey.
Jersey-lined trousers in soft cotton twill with a lightly brushed finish. Adjustable elastication and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket.
Bag in cotton mesh with round plastic handles at the top and a zipped inner compartment. Unlined.

Lightly padded bomber jacket with a lined, detachable hood in sweatshirt fabric and a ribbed stand-up collar. Zip down the front with a chin guard, side pockets with a press-stud and a zipped pocket on one sleeve. Gathered seams down the sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Jacket in soft faux fur with a collar, press-studs down the front and front pockets. Lined.
Waistcoat in sturdy, herringbone-patterned jersey with buttons down the front, fake welt pockets and a chest pocket.
Bikini briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow elasticated straps at the waist and medium coverage at the back.
Jersey-lined cargo trousers in a cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and flap front, back and leg pockets with a concealed press-stud.
Wide jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with a V-neck, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Lace and mesh bra with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes. Medium coverage.
Pyjamas with a long-sleeved top in cotton jersey and trousers in soft cotton twill. Top with buttons down the front. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Trainers in imitation leather with glitter, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back and a lace trim at the hem.
5-pocket, high-waisted jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details and slim legs with raw-edge hems.

Calf-length dress in a jacquard weave made from recycled polyester and recycled polyamide. V-neck and 3/4-length puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Wide, detachable tie belt at the waist, a gathered seam above the knees for added width, and an asymmetric hem. Unlined.
Wide T-shirt in sturdy jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Sturdy, soft fine-knit tights with an elasticated waist.

Knee-length dress in an airy cotton and viscose weave with a small, frilled collar and a V-shaped opening with ties at the neckline. Short, wide raglan sleeves and gathered tiers to the hem for added width. V-neck underdress with adjustable shoulder straps.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in an airy cotton weave with wide elastication and small frill at the top. 3/4-length sleeves with ties at the ends and a rounded hem.

prod_name: PELLE Basic S/S jersey polo SB
detail_desc: Polo shirt in organic cotton jersey with a ribbed collar and button placket.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in cotton twill with hard-worn details, a high waist and zip fly and button.
Boxer shorts in organic cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Short skirt in a patterned viscose weave with a high, elasticated drawstring waist and a flounce at the hem.
V-neck satin cami top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a lace trim at the top.

Shirt in soft, cotton-weave corduroy with a turn-down collar, classic front, open chest pocket and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Super push-up bralette in lace and mesh with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a wide lace and mesh trim at the hem and a wide hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool. Ribbed turtle neck with a small frill trim, a small frill trim at the cuffs, and a ribbed hem.
Trainers with pompoms at the front, a lightly padded top edge, hook and loop tabs at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Metal earrings in various sizes. Diameter from 2.3 cm to 7.6 cm.

Wash bag in soft leather with a zip at the top that continues a small way down the sides to make it easy to access the contents. One inner compartment. This product has been made in Sweden using remnants of Italian leather that have been repurposed and given a new lease of life. Width 9 cm. Height 12 cm. Length 22 cm.
Short beach kaftan in an airy weave with lace trims. Short, wide sleeves, and a drawstring at the waist.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and an open back pocket. Sewn-in turn-ups at the hems with the reverse side showing.
Hipster briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Butterfly-shaped, plastic hair clips in vibrant colours.

Calf-length dress in pleated jersey with a slight sheen. Small stand-up collar with ties at the back of the neck and a V-shaped opening at the back. Short, wide sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, an elasticated seam at the waist and a laser-cut hem. Unlined.
Short dress in soft, washed cotton twill with buttons down the front, adjustable straps with metal fasteners, and patch front pockets. Unlined.
Long-sleeved jersey top with a motif on the front. Slightly longer with a rounded hem at the back.
Short thin metal chain necklace with a small, padlock-shaped pendant. Adjustable length 41-47 cm. The zinc content of the necklace is recycled.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Lace briefs with a low waist and cutaway coverage at the back. Gusset with a cotton jersey lining.
Short shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with lined cups with removable inserts, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a racer back with a ventilating mesh detail. Wide elastication at the hem. Medium support.

Short dress in airy chiffon with a flounce-trimmed V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front and an elasticated seam at the waist. Sleeves with elastication and a flounce at the cuffs, and a flounce at the hem. Lined.
